Sentencas: An investigation of syngas production using solid oxide electrolysis was carried out.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: A conventional solid oxide cell based on Ni supporting cathode, thin yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte, yttria-doped ceria interlayer, and strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite and ferrite-based perovskite anode (Ni-YSZ/YSZ/YDC/LSPC) was used for the reduction of CO2 and water to syngas.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: This process was assisted by H-2 added to the reactant in various amounts to maintain the Ni sites in a metallic state.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: This was necessary to favour CO2 reaction and to avoid ohmic constraints that may derive from the occurrence of Ni re oxidation as consequence of the presence of oxidising species like CO2 and water.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: The outlet gas was analysed by gas chromatography.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: The presence of CO and CH4 beside CO2 and H-2 was detected in the outlet stream.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: Analysis of outlet gas composition revealed that CO was produced by both electrochemical and catalytic mechanisms.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study

Sentencas: Suitable CO2 conversion was achieved using dry gas.
Titulo: Production of syngas by solid oxide electrolysis: A case study
